name: HospiceServicesReceivedDuringMeasurementPeriodHCPCS
title: Hospice Services Received During Measurement Period (HCPCS)
description: This value set contains HCPCS attestation codes indicating that a person received hospice services at any time during the measurement period.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains HCPCS concepts indicating that a person received hospice services at any time during the measurement period.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify people received hospice services at any time during the measurement period. This element may map to "Encounter" Category of the Quality Data Model.),(Inclusion Criteria: attestation codes indicating that a person received hospice services at any time during the measurement period.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes codes used to specify that hospice is just one potential service of two or more services the person may have received during the measurement period.)
